title: Rasu to Kisu
description: High school student, Inugami, with a nose too sensitive, has suffered all his life from the "smell of the world"!! The only thing able to relax him was his own house, which his grandfather kept clean! One day, a tragedy strikes upon him, driving him into a conflict between struggling for himself and kissing another! A bit erotic, science fiction battle starts now!!

matches.title: The Strongest Dull Prince’s Secret Battle for the Throne
